entity.name: app
entity.deltaQuery: select id from apps WHERE time_updated > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}'

entity.name: app_tag
entity.query: select tag_id from app_tags where app_id = '${app.id}'

entity.name: tag
entity.query: select name from tags where id = '${app_tag.tag_id}'

entity.name: app_logo
entity.query: SELECT CONCAT('/images/apps/',SUBSTRING(CAST(app_id AS CHAR CHARACTER SET utf8),IF(app_id>9,-2,-1),2),'/',file_name) AS file_source FROM app_images WHERE app_id = '${app.id}' AND type = 'logo'

entity.name: app_screenshot
entity.query: SELECT CONCAT('/images/apps/',SUBSTRING(CAST(app_id AS CHAR CHARACTER SET utf8),IF(app_id>9,-2,-1),2),'/',file_name) AS file_source FROM app_images WHERE app_id = '${app.id}' AND type = 'screenshot'

entity.name: app_screenshot_large

entity.name: app_screenshot_small
entity.query: SELECT CONCAT('/images/apps/',SUBSTRING(CAST(app_id AS CHAR CHARACTER SET utf8),IF(app_id>9,-2,-1),2),'/',file_name) AS file_source FROM app_images WHERE app_id = '${app.id}' AND type = 'screenshot_small'

entity.name: app_homepage_url
entity.query: SELECT url AS homepage_url FROM app_urls WHERE app_id = '${app.id}' AND type = 'homepage'

entity.name: app_homepage_title
entity.query: SELECT data AS homepage_title FROM app_external_media WHERE app_id = '${app.id}' AND type = 'homepage_title'
